scripts.lhci:ci:both: dotenv -e .env -- bash -lc "lhci collect --config=./lighthouserc.cjs && lhci collect --config=./lighthouserc.desktop.cjs --collect.additive && lhci assert --config=./lighthouserc.cjs && lhci assert --config=./lighthouserc.desktop.cjs && lhci upload --config=./lighthouserc.cjs --ignoreDuplicateBuildFailure"
scripts.docker:playwright:base: docker run --rm --init       -v $PWD:/work -w /work       --shm-size=2g       -e PLAYWRIGHT_BROWSERS_PATH=/ms-playwright       -v ${PW_BROWSERS_VOL:-erades_pw_browsers}:/ms-playwright       -v ${PW_NODE_MODULES_VOL:-erades_pw_node_modules}:/work/node_modules       -v ${PW_STORE_VOL:-erades_pw_pnpm_store}:/work/.pnpm-store       erades-com-e2e bash -lc '         set -euo pipefail;         pnpm config set store-dir /work/.pnpm-store;         pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --reporter default;         exec "$@"       '
scripts.docker:test:e2e: pnpm run docker:playwright:build && pnpm run docker:playwright:base -- pnpm exec playwright test tests/e2e/
scripts.docker:test:visual: pnpm run docker:playwright:build && pnpm run docker:playwright:base -- pnpm exec playwright test tests/visual-regression/
scripts.docker:test:visual:update: pnpm run docker:playwright:build && pnpm run docker:playwright:base -- pnpm exec playwright test tests/visual-regression/ --update-snapshots
scripts.docker:test:visual:enhanced:update: pnpm run docker:playwright:build && pnpm run docker:playwright:base -- pnpm exec playwright test tests/visual-regression/visual-regression-enhanced.spec.ts --update-snapshots
